title: Fabulous & Renovated 2 bed 1 car parking in Brookline
posting_body: This unbeatable completely renovated 2 bed townhome feel truly checks off all the boxes.

This fabulous first floor unit has been restored with gleaming hardwood floors throughout, all recessed lighting, custom kitchen with new appliances, spacious cabinets and butcher block countertops, custom tiles and spacious bathroom, giant master bed, decorative fireplace, private laundry and CENTRAL AC !!!!….
In addition to the endless interior amenities this fabulous property boast equally of its exterior.

Located along a private way and dead end street provides you with the best of both worlds of peace and tranquillity but still a commuters dreams as it’s 2 block from the most desirable shops, restaurants, markets, and Major Highways.
1 car parking, gas heat and cooking.
